thread.title: Ground News - High Court rules same-sex couples eligible to adopt children
thread.title_full: Ground News - High Court rules same-sex couples eligible to adopt children

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - High Court rules same-sex couples eligible to adopt children
text:
Summary by Ground News Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh met Iranian Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei in Tehran to discuss Iran's cooperation in the Gaza war. Hamas had given Iran no warning of its October 7 attack on Israel , and that Iran would not enter the war on Hamas' behalf. Khamenei said Iran would continue to lend the group political and moral support. Share menu More
Filters 6 Articles 6 Articles All Left Center Right
Haaretz Lean Left High Factuality Independent: Salman Schocken Media Conglomerate: M. DuMont Schauberg Israel can't discriminate against same-sex couples looking to adopt, top court rules The High Court of Justice ruled that heterosexual should not be prioritized over same-sex couples in the process of adopting children
8 hours ago · Tel Aviv- Yafo, Israel Read Full Article
Haaretz Lean Left High Factuality Independent: Salman Schocken Media Conglomerate: M. DuMont Schauberg
Israel can't discriminate against same-sex couples looking to adopt, top court rules The High Court of Justice ruled that heterosexual should not be prioritized over same-sex couples in the process of adopting children
8 hours ago · Tel Aviv- Yafo, Israel Read Full Article Jerusalem Post Center Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: The Jerusalem Post High Court rules same-sex couples eligible to adopt children 'A historic, groundbreaking victory which gives a shred of light and hope in these difficult times.'
8 hours ago · Jerusalem, Israel Read Full Article
Jerusalem Post Center Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: The Jerusalem Post
High Court rules same-sex couples eligible to adopt children 'A historic, groundbreaking victory which gives a shred of light and hope in these difficult times.'
8 hours ago · Jerusalem, Israel Read Full Article חדשות היום, כלכלה, ספורט, רכילות, בריאות, טכנולוגיה | מעריב… HISTORIC HIGH COURT RULING: “SAME-SEX SPOUSES ARE ELIGIBLE TO ADOPT CHILDREN” In the composition of Justices Stein, Wings-Steinitz and Acting President Fogelman, the Supreme Court unanimously ruled that same-sex spouses are competent to adopt children. LGBT Association CEO: “Groundbreaking achievement that sheds some light on these difficult days”
8 hours ago Read Full Article
חדשות היום, כלכלה, ספורט, רכילות, בריאות, טכנולוגיה | מעריב…
HISTORIC HIGH COURT RULING: “SAME-SEX SPOUSES ARE ELIGIBLE TO ADOPT CHILDREN” In the composition of Justices Stein, Wings-Steinitz and Acting President Fogelman, the Supreme Court unanimously ruled that same-sex spouses are competent to adopt children. LGBT Association CEO: “Groundbreaking achievement that sheds some light on these difficult days”
8 hours ago Read Full Article וואלה! The High Court of Justice ruled that same-sex couples can adopt children in Israel In a dramatic ruling, the Supreme Court ruled that, contrary to the interpretation hitherto practiced by the State, that only heterosexual couples can adopt children, and adoption by same-sex couples is approved only in exceptional cases, the adoption of homosexual couples can be approved within the framework of existing law. Petitioners: “A ray of light in the darkness”
7 hours ago Read Full Article
וואלה!
The High Court of Justice ruled that same-sex couples can adopt children in Israel In a dramatic ruling, the Supreme Court ruled that, contrary to the interpretation hitherto practiced by the State, that only heterosexual couples can adopt children, and adoption by same-sex couples is approved only in exceptional cases, the adoption of homosexual couples can be approved within the framework of existing law. Petitioners: “A ray of light in the darkness”
7 hours ago Read Full Article mako בג"ץ קבע – בני זוג מאותו מין כשירים לאמץ פסיקה היסטורית: השופטים הכריעו בעתירה שהוגשה, וקיבלו את הפרשנות שלפיה גם זוגות חד מיניים יוכלו לאמץ ילדים • ההחלטה הגיעה לאחר שהמדינה הבהירה כי אין בכוונתה להסדיר את הסוגייה בזמן הקרוב • ההסבר לפסיקה: טובת הילד היא לגדול בתא משפחתי שכולל זוג הורים - ללא קשר למינם ונטייתם
8 hours ago Read Full Article
mako
בג"ץ קבע – בני זוג מאותו מין כשירים לאמץ פסיקה היסטורית: השופטים הכריעו בעתירה שהוגשה, וקיבלו את הפרשנות שלפיה גם זוגות חד מיניים יוכלו לאמץ ילדים • ההחלטה הגיעה לאחר שהמדינה הבהירה כי אין בכוונתה להסדיר את הסוגייה בזמן הקרוב • ההסבר לפסיקה: טובת הילד היא לגדול בתא משפחתי שכולל זוג הורים - ללא קשר למינם ונטייתם
8 hours ago Read Full Article israelhayom.co.il Supreme Court rules: Same-sex couples will be able to adopt children The Supreme Court accepted the petitions filed by the Association Tax and ruled that the adoption law should be interpreted so that the long-standing apportionment in adoption towards LGBT couples is abolished • The adoption law states that “there is no adoption except by a man and his wife together” thus stating that LGBT couples who can only adopt children heterosexual couples are not interested in •
8 hours ago Read Full Article
israelhayom.co.il
Supreme Court rules: Same-sex couples will be able to adopt children The Supreme Court accepted the petitions filed by the Association Tax and ruled that the adoption law should be interpreted so that the long-standing apportionment in adoption towards LGBT couples is abolished • The adoption law states that “there is no adoption except by a man and his wife together” thus stating that LGBT couples who can only adopt children heterosexual couples are not interested in •
